meanings.definition: To lower and raise the head quickly, as to indicate agreement or acknowledgment.
meanings.sent1: She nods in agreement during the meeting.
meanings.sent2: He always nods when he understands something.
meanings.sent3: The dog nods along with the music, looking quite funny.
meanings.sent4: The trees nod in the wind, a silent conversation among nature.
meanings.sent5: Her head nods vigorously, showing her enthusiasm.

meanings.definition: A quick, slight movement of the head forward and back, often as a sign of agreement or acknowledgment.
meanings.sent1: The nods of the audience showed their approval.
meanings.sent2: He gave a nod to indicate he heard her.
meanings.sent3: The nods of the bobblehead doll made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The nods of the flowers in the breeze were like a gentle dance.
meanings.sent5: She received nods of understanding from her classmates.
